ComicInfo.Summary: From the tales of Cinderalla, Sleeping Beauty, The Little Mermaid and Snow White comes Damsels! In the aftermath of King Persine's rousing speech against magic violence erupts on the streets of Caumont. As citizen battles citizen the Queens Talia, Rapunzel, and Belle are busy making plans for the real war to come. Rapa manages to escape from the belly of the mighty wyrm only to find herself an unsuspecting guest in a mysterious palace of the night. But what exactly are her curious hosts' intentions? Dare she stay for just one more dance?
ComicInfo.Tags: The Great Wyrm,Mother Gothel,Dwarves,Amphibian Girl,Ulf,Brökk,Heinrich,Queen Belle,King Aurore,Mermaids,King Persine,Fairies,Carabosse,Rapunzel
